name: National Chiao Tung University
description: The National Chiao Tung University is located in Hsinchu, Taiwan. Over the last 45 years, the Chiao Tung University become center of academic excellence and has made significant contributions to the development of Information/ Communication/ Optoelectronics Sciences and Technology and to the world economy. The University has six colleges offering undergraduate, masters, and Ph.D. degrees in Science, Engineering, Management, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, Humanities and Social Sciences, and Biological Science and Technology. Within these colleges there are 18 departments, 36 graduate research institutes, and 20 degree programs for working professionals. Student enrolment currently stands at 10,500 with 5,500 graduate students and 5,000 undergraduates. The National Chiao Tung University strives to create a balanced and harmonious environment for academic pursuits.
